About Me

Some random stuff about me........

BIO

first year student at University of Delhi with a passion of innovate technology. A software and hardware hobbyist, most of my work is self directed project. With knowledge in designs, creatives, marketing, relations and fundamentals in python, HTML, css, Java, MySQL, I am ready to work on various other projects soon.

MASH Project Foundation

Designer

- Created Infographics highlighting importance of various SDGs

- Was in Logistics team at India CSR summit, managed IT/Audio-Visuals for 2 days at the summit along with ha doing logistics

- Was IT head at Daan Utsav, created Graphic

DUBulletin

CoFounder

DU Bulletin is an independent online media platform working towards making the students aware regarding each and every ins and outs of the University of Delhi. We intend to provide students with the information regarding the various social, cultural and academic events going around in different colleges. We also provide various societies in various colleges a chance to promote their events and fests. Our sole purpose is to bring information to limelight because information brings opportunity and opportunities bring success.

Debating Society

Core Member

- Currently in charge of Graphics and IT related to the society

- Key role in designing and publishing Graphics related to vaious debating events

- Contest in various debating competition bringing laurels to the society
